name: PUZZLEGEDDON
description:
Set in an array of galaxies, PUZZLEGEDDON™ features a clever mix of puzzle, action and strategy in a game that is fast-paced and addictive.

Features
• Solo Brawl Mode – Battle against different bots in either Battle Royale or Deathmatch.
• Battle Royale Mode – Be the last one standing and compete for bonus points in a series of rounds. Choose your time limit, # of bots, difficulty level and modify handicap settings to your liking.
• Deathmatch Mode – Compete for points in time-based matches and clear mini-challenges to return to the game if you are blown off the planet.
• Poison Peril Modes – Strategize to solve puzzles to survive on the poisonous planet.
• Online Multiplayer – Battle in online multiplayer action in Battle Royale or Deathmatch with up to five other people or bots.
• Tutorial – If "puzzle, action, and strategy" sounds too much to handle, there is a handy guide to walk you through helpful strategies for a better gameplay experience.
